props.name: cardHeaderBsPrefix
props.docblock: Change the underlying component CSS base class name and modifier class names prefix.

description.text: Change the underlying component CSS base class name and modifier class names prefix.

props.name: defaultActiveKey
props.docblock: Specifies default active nav (uncontrolled usage).

description.text: Specifies default active nav (uncontrolled usage).

props.name: activeKey
props.docblock: Marks the NavItem with a matching eventKey (or href if present) as active.

description.text: Marks the NavItem with a matching eventKey (or href if present) as active.

props.name: as
props.docblock: Set a custom element for this component.

description.text: Set a custom element for this component.

props.name: fill
props.docblock: Have all `NavItems` proportionately fill all available width.

description.text: Have all `NavItems` proportionately fill all available width.

props.name: justify
props.docblock: Have all `NavItems` evenly fill all available width.

description.text: Have all `NavItems` evenly fill all available width.

props.name: navbar
props.docblock:
Apply styling an alignment for use in a `Navbar`.
This prop will be set automatically when the `Nav` is used inside a `Navbar`.

description.text:
Apply styling an alignment for use in a `Navbar`.
This prop will be set automatically when the `Nav` is used inside a `Navbar`.

props.name: onKeyDown
props.docblock: Callback fired when a key is pressed.

description.text: Callback fired when a key is pressed.

props.name: onSelect
props.docblock: A callback fired when a NavItem is selected.

description.text: A callback fired when a NavItem is selected.

props.name: role
props.docblock:
ARIA role for the `Nav`, in the context of a `TabContainer`,
the default will be set to "tablist", but can be overridden by the `Nav` when set explicitly.

description.text:
ARIA role for the `Nav`, in the context of a `TabContainer`,
the default will be set to "tablist", but can be overridden by the `Nav` when set explicitly.

props.name: variant
props.docblock: The visual variant of the nav items.

description.text: The visual variant of the nav items.

props.name: bsPrefix
props.docblock: Change the underlying component CSS base class name and modifier class names prefix.

description.text: Change the underlying component CSS base class name and modifier class names prefix.

props.name: role
props.docblock: The ARIA role for the `NavItem`

description.text: The ARIA role for the `NavItem`

props.name: as
props.docblock: Set a custom element for this component.

description.text: Set a custom element for this component.

props.name: bsPrefix
props.docblock: Change the underlying component CSS base class name and modifier class names prefix.

description.text: Change the underlying component CSS base class name and modifier class names prefix.

props.name: onSelect
props.docblock: Callback fired when the active item changes.

description.text: Callback fired when the active item changes.

props.name: active
props.docblock: The active state of the `NavItem` item.

description.text: The active state of the `NavItem` item.

props.name: as
props.docblock: You can use a custom element type for this component.

description.text: You can use a custom element type for this component.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: The disabled state of the `NavItem` item.

description.text: The disabled state of the `NavItem` item.

props.name: eventKey
props.docblock:
Uniquely identifies the `NavItem` amongst its siblings,
used to determine and control the active state of the parent `Nav`

description.text:
Uniquely identifies the `NavItem` amongst its siblings,
used to determine and control the active state of the parent `Nav`

props.name: href
props.docblock: The HTML href attribute for the `NavLink`

description.text: The HTML href attribute for the `NavLink`

props.name: role
props.docblock: The ARIA role for the `NavLink`, In the context of a 'tablist' parent `Nav`, the role defaults to 'tab'

description.text: The ARIA role for the `NavLink`, In the context of a 'tablist' parent `Nav`, the role defaults to 'tab'

props.name: bsPrefix
props.docblock: Change the underlying component CSS base class name and modifier class names prefix.

description.text: Change the underlying component CSS base class name and modifier class names prefix.

props.name: id
props.docblock: An html id attribute for the `Toggle` button, necessary for assistive technologies, such as screen readers.

description.text: An html id attribute for the `Toggle` button, necessary for assistive technologies, such as screen readers.

props.name: title
props.docblock: The content of the non-toggle Button.

description.text: The content of the non-toggle Button.

props.name: active
props.docblock: Style the toggle `NavLink` as active

description.text: Style the toggle `NavLink` as active

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: Disables the toggle `NavLink`

description.text: Disables the toggle `NavLink`

props.name: menuRole
props.docblock: An ARIA accessible role applied to the `Menu` component.

description.text: An ARIA accessible role applied to the `Menu` component.

props.name: menuVariant
props.docblock: Menu color variant. Omitting this will use the default light color.

description.text: Menu color variant. Omitting this will use the default light color.

props.name: onClick
props.docblock: An `onClick` handler passed to the `Toggle` component

description.text: An `onClick` handler passed to the `Toggle` component

props.name: renderMenuOnMount
props.docblock: Whether to render the dropdown menu in the DOM before the first time it is shown.

description.text: Whether to render the dropdown menu in the DOM before the first time it is shown.

props.name: rootCloseEvent
props.docblock: Which event when fired outside the component will cause it to be closed.

description.text: Which event when fired outside the component will cause it to be closed.

props.name: bsPrefix
props.docblock: Change the underlying component CSS base class name and modifier class names prefix.

description.text: Change the underlying component CSS base class name and modifier class names prefix.
